trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FocusVisualStyle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FocusVisualStyle" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> should force the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] to render the cursor as declared by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 是否应该强制[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 按照 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor" /> 属性所声明的方式呈现光标。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if cursor presentation while over this element is forced to use current <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor" /> settings for the cursor (including on all child elements); otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果强制光标在位于此元素（包括所有子元素）上时的呈现使用光标的当前 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor" /> 设置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true` you will override the cursor preferences established by child elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为`true`将重写建立的子元素的光标首选项。

trans-unit.source: Doing so in general application [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] might be confusing for the user, particularly if child elements are attempting to specify cursors.
trans-unit.target: 这样做因此一般情况下应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]可能令人困惑的用户，尤其是当子元素尝试指定游标。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ForceCursor%2A> is more appropriate in control subclassing or compositing scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ForceCursor%2A>控件子类化或组合方案中更合适。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example forces the cursor value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例强制光标值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ForceCursor" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ForceCursor" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The target <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> to get the binding from.
trans-unit.target: 从中获取绑定的目标 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> that represents the binding on the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示指定属性上的绑定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> if the target property has an active binding; otherwise, returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标属性具有活动绑定，将返回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" />；否则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Checking the return value for `null` is a technique you can use to determine whether a property has an active binding.
trans-unit.target: 检查的返回值`null`是一种技术，可用于确定属性是否具有活动的绑定。

trans-unit.source: This method is really just a convenience wrapper around the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是实际上只是方便周围的包装器<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetBindingExpression%2A> passes the current instance and the `dp` parameter to <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetBindingExpression%2A> 将当前实例传递和`dp`参数<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The element to return a <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection" /> for.
trans-unit.target: 要为其返回 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection" /> 的元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection" /> attached property for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection" /> 附加属性值。

trans-unit.source: The requested flow direction, as a value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 所请求的流方向（作为一个枚举值）。

trans-unit.source: The main purpose of this method is to support attached property syntax for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> property, therefore allowing child elements of a provided <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> to specify flow direction for the arrangement within their parent element.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的主要用途是支持的附加的属性语法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>属性，从而使子元素提供的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>指定其父元素内的排列的数据流方向。

trans-unit.source: To get the value on the current <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, use the direct [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessor <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的值对当前<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，使用 direct[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]访问器<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The size of the part of the element that does visual presentation.
trans-unit.target: 执行可视化演示的元素的部分大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns a geometry for a clipping mask.
trans-unit.target: 返回剪切蒙版的形状。

trans-unit.source: The mask applies if the layout system attempts to arrange an element that is larger than the available display space.
trans-unit.target: 如果布局系统尝试排列的元素大小超过可用显示空间，将会应用蒙版。

trans-unit.source: The clipping geometry.
trans-unit.target: 剪切形状。

trans-unit.source: Margins will be subtracted from the `layoutSlotSize` as part of layout system behavior.
trans-unit.target: 将从减去边距`layoutSlotSize`布局系统行为的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A returned null reference indicates that no clipping will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回 null 引用指示没有剪辑将发生。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns `null` when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现始终返回`null`时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重写 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> implementation uses <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A> in its calculations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>实现使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>其计算中。

trans-unit.source: Several subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> override this method again.
trans-unit.target: 一些子类<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>再次重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, overrides to always return `null` because adorners are often deliberately outside the ordinary bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Adorner.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>将重写以便始终返回`null`因为装饰器通常都特意普通的范围之外。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> return `null` if <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>返回`null`如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns <see langword="null" /> when <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现始终返回<see langword="null" />时<see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds" />是<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Overrides are generally expected to preserve this behavior, although there are exceptions, depending on the relationship and purpose of the derived class and its layout logic as opposed to the base class.
trans-unit.target: 替代通常应保留此行为，尽管有例外，具体取决于关系和派生的类和其布局逻辑，而不是类的基类的用途。

trans-unit.source: Name of the child to find.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的子级的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the named element in the visual tree of an instantiated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回实例化的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate" /> 可视化树中的命名元素。

trans-unit.source: The requested element.
trans-unit.target: 请求的元素。

trans-unit.source: May be <see langword="null" /> if no element of the requested name exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有所请求名称的元素不存在，则可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Templates in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] have a self-contained namescope.
trans-unit.target: 中的模板[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]具有自包含的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: This is because templates are re-used, and any name defined in a template cannot remain unique when multiple instances of a control each instantiate its template.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为模板可以重复使用，并且当多个实例的每个控件实例化其模板，模板中定义的任何名称不能保持唯一。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetTemplateChild%2A> method to return references to objects that come from the template after it is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetTemplateChild%2A>方法返回对来自该模板后实例化的对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to find items from templates because <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> acts in a more general scope, and there is no connection between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> class itself and the instantiated template once it is applied.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以查找模板中的项，因为<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>以更通用作用域，并且没有之间没有连接<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>类本身和实例化的模板后应用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> supplies the same function as this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 提供此方法与相同的功能。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is public instead of protected, and it uses correct name-scoping considerations that allow it to access the template within an element and find named items within it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 而不是公共受保护，并使用正确允许其访问内部元素并查找名为其中的项的模板的名称范围的注意事项。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> when you need to get an element outside of its parent control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>何时需要获取其父控件外部元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns an alternative logical parent for this element if there is no visual parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有视觉父级，则返回此元素的备用逻辑父级。

trans-unit.source: Returns something other than <see langword="null" /> whenever a WPF framework-level implementation of this method has a non-visual parent connection.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法的 WPF 框架级别实现具有非视觉父级连接时，即返回 <see langword="null" /> 之外的内容。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GetUIParentCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重写 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GetUIParentCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> implementation returns the expected single visual parent, which is the same result as getting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>实现返回预期的单个视觉父级，即与获取相同的结果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: Derived class implementations might return alternate parent relationships.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类的实现可能会返回备用父关系。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the requested child element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中请求的子元素的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Visual.GetVisualChild(System.Int32)" />, and returns a child at the specified index from a collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Visual.GetVisualChild(System.Int32)" />，然后从子元素集合返回指定索引处的子级。

trans-unit.source: The requested child element.
trans-unit.target: 请求的子元素。

trans-unit.source: This should not return <see langword="null" />; if the provided index is out of range, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 它不应返回 <see langword="null" />；如果提供的索引超出范围，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> implementation, the only valid index is zero.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>实现中，唯一有效的索引为零。

trans-unit.source: The content model for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild%2A> supports either zero or one child elements, not a collection.
trans-unit.target: 内容模型<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild%2A>支持零个或一个子元素，不是一个集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how a custom adorner uses the values declared by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection> that it maintains for its multiple visual children.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何自定义的装饰器使用声明的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection>，它还为多个 visual 子级保留。

trans-unit.source: These values are reported through overrides of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VisualChildrenCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 这些值通过重写报告<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VisualChildrenCount%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is only valid for elements that do not maintain any more descriptive collection of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: 此实现仅适用于不维护任何更具描述性的可视子元素集合的元素。

trans-unit.source: Any element that does have such a collection must override this method and map the index to an equivalent index in the child element collection that is supported by that element.
trans-unit.target: 具有此类集合的任何元素必须重写此方法，并将索引映射到该元素支持的子元素集合中的等效索引。

trans-unit.source: An index in the range from zero to <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VisualChildrenCount" /> (minus one) should return a valid element; any other index should throw an out-of-range exception.
trans-unit.target: 从零到范围中的索引<see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VisualChildrenCount" />（减 1)，则应返回有效的元素; 任何其他索引应引发超出范围异常。

trans-unit.source: An example of an element type that does support a child collection and overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild(System.Int32)" /> to return more than one possible child is <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" />.
trans-unit.target: 元素类型的支持子集合和替代示例<see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild(System.Int32)" />返回多个可能的子是<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation in <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> presumes only one visual child.
trans-unit.target: 中的默认实现<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />假定只有一个可视化子级。

trans-unit.source: Any value passed for <paramref name="index" /> other than zero causes an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 传递给任何值<paramref name="index" />以外零原因会导致异常引发。

trans-unit.source: Several common elements, such as decorators, adorners, or elements with specialized rendering, override the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> implementation (of the implementation from intermediate base classes).
trans-unit.target: 几种常见的元素，如修饰符、 装饰器或具有专用呈现的元素替代<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />（的中间在基类中实现） 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Some implementations still enforce one visual child whereas others allow a collection.
trans-unit.target: 某些实现仍然强制一个可视化子级，而另一些则允许集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the suggested height of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素的建议高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the element, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 元素的高度（以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: This value must be equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 此值必须等于或大于 0.0。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> is one of three writable properties on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that specify height information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> 三个可写属性之一位于<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>用于指定高度信息。

trans-unit.source: The other two are <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 另外两个是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If there is a conflict between these values, the order of application for actual height determination is that first <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A> must be honored, then <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>, and finally, if it is within bounds, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有发生冲突这三个值，确定高度的实际的应用程序的顺序是： 首先<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>必须采用，然后<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>，最后，如果它是在限制之内， <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If this element is a child element within some other element, then setting this property to a value is really only a suggested value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素是一个子元素在其他某个元素，然后将此属性设置为值实际上只有一个建议的值。

trans-unit.source: The layout system as well as the particular layout logic of the parent element will use the value as a nonbinding input during the layout process.
trans-unit.target: 布局系统，以及父元素的特定布局逻辑将使用值作为没有约束力的输入在布局过程。

trans-unit.source: In practical terms, a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> is almost always the child element of something else; even when you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> on <xref:System.Windows.Window>.
trans-unit.target: 在实际情况下，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>几乎始终是也是如此。 的子元素，即使你设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Window>。

trans-unit.source: (For <xref:System.Windows.Window>, that value is used when the underlying application model establishes the basic rendering assumptions that create the Hwnd that hosts the application.)
trans-unit.target: (有关<xref:System.Windows.Window>，值时的基础的应用程序模型建立创建 Hwnd 的基本呈现假设使用托管的应用程序。)

trans-unit.source: In addition to acceptable <xref:System.Double> values, this property can also be <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此外可接受<xref:System.Double>值，此属性也可以是<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This is how you specify auto sizing behavior in code.
trans-unit.target: 这是如何在代码中指定自动调整大小行为。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] you set the value to the string "Auto" (case insensitive) to enable the auto sizing behavior.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]你设置的值为字符串"自动"（不区分大小写） 若要启用自动调整大小行为。

trans-unit.source: Auto sizing behavior implies that the element will fill the height available to it.
trans-unit.target: 自动调整大小行为意味着元素将填满可用的高度。

trans-unit.source: Note however that specific controls frequently supply default values through their default theme styles that will disable the auto sizing behavior unless it is specifically re-enabled.
trans-unit.target: 但是请注意，特定的控件通常提供通过将禁用自动调整大小行为，除非专门重新启用了其默认主题样式的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The return value of this property is always the same as any value that was set to it.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的返回值始终是任何已设置为它的值相同。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> may vary.
trans-unit.target: 相反，值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>可能会有所不同。

trans-unit.source: This can happen either statically because the layout rejected the suggested size for some reason, or momentarily.
trans-unit.target: 这种情况可能是静态因为布局出于某种原因，被拒绝的建议的大小也可能是暂时。

trans-unit.source: The layout system itself works asynchronously relative to the property system's set of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> and may not have processed that particular sizing property change yet.
trans-unit.target: 布局系统本身相对于属性系统以异步方式工作<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>，可能不处理该特定的大小调整属性的更改。

trans-unit.source: The value restrictions on the <xref:System.Double> value are enforced by a <xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback> mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 对的值限制<xref:System.Double>由强制执行值<xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback>机制。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set an invalid value, a run-time exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置一个无效值，则会引发一个运行时异常。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the validation check, there is a nondeterministic upper value bound for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> that is enforced by the layout system (this is a very large number, larger than <xref:System.Single.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> but smaller than <xref:System.Double.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: 除了验证检查，没有为具有不确定性上限值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>，由布局系统强制执行 (这是非常大的数，大于<xref:System.Single.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>但小于<xref:System.Double.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: If you exceed this bound, the element will not render, and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果超过此限制，该元素将不会呈现，并不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Do not set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> to a value that is significantly larger than the maximum size of any possible visual display, or you may exceed this nondeterministic upper bound.
trans-unit.target: 未设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>为远远大于任何可能的可视显示，或你的最大大小可能超出此非确定性上限值。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *double*
trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式<xref:System.Double>等于或大于 0.0 的值。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks for upper bound information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅“备注”以了解上限信息。

trans-unit.source: This value is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 此值解释为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字符串不需要显式包括位小数。

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值的`1`是可以接受的。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble*
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble*

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*该值，上文所述跟以下单位声明字符串之一： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （默认值） 是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in==96px
trans-unit.target: `in` 为英寸;1 英寸 = = 96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px
`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
**Auto**
trans-unit.target: **Auto**

trans-unit.source: Enables autosizing behavior.
trans-unit.target: 启用自动调整大小行为。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅“备注”。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment characteristics applied to this element when it is composed within a parent element, such as a panel or items control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在父元素(如 Panel 或项控件)中组合此元素时所应用的水平对齐特征。

trans-unit.source: A horizontal alignment setting, as a value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 水平对齐设置，它是一个枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> properties are explicitly set on an element, these measurements take higher precedent during layout and will cancel the typical effects of setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>元素上显式设置属性，这些度量值在布局过程较高的优先级并且将取消设置的典型效果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> is the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] property accessor for what is in reality a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]它实际上是依赖项属性的属性访问器。

trans-unit.source: This particular dependency property quite frequently has its apparent "default" value set differently in subclassed elements, particularly controls.
trans-unit.target: 此特定的依赖项属性非常普遍地具有子类化元素，尤其是控件中以不同方式设置其原本"默认"值。

trans-unit.source: This generally occurs in one of two ways: the dependency property is re-registered to a particular subclass, but with different metadata for setting its defaults; or there is a default style being applied that sets that dependency property value differently.
trans-unit.target: 这通常发生在两种方式之一： 特定子类化，但具有不同的元数据，用于设置其默认值; 重新注册依赖项属性或者应用了默认样式以不同方式设置的依赖项属性值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the apparent "default" of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> control will be <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, even though <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> inherits <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> direct from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，明显"默认"的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>控件将是<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>，即使<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>继承<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>直接从<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>。

trans-unit.source: This is because that value was reset within the default style of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, within the style's control template.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为该值已重置中的默认样式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>中的样式的控件模板。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> does not use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> when composing layout, because <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> is based on absolute positioning.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> 不使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>构成布局，因为时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>根据绝对定位。

trans-unit.source: When inherited by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> or derived classes, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> redefines the default value of this dependency property to be <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>.
trans-unit.target: 当通过继承<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>或派生类中，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>重新定义为此依赖项属性的默认值<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scope limits for property value inheritance, resource key lookup, and RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置属性值继承、资源键查找和RelativeSource FindAncestor 查找的范围限制。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 枚举的一个值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior.Default" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior.Default" />。

trans-unit.source: Certain boundaries in the element tree set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InheritanceBehavior%2A> to deliberately limit the scope of inheritance behavior, to a force resource lookup to check the application resources, or to prevent a RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup from querying the current element or any further.
trans-unit.target: 元素中的某些边界树集<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InheritanceBehavior%2A>有意限制继承行为，强制资源查找检查应用程序资源，或防止 RelativeSource FindAncestor 查找查询的当前元素的作用域或任何进一步。

trans-unit.source: RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup occurs when a binding uses a <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> that has its <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property set to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用的绑定时发生 RelativeSource FindAncestor 查找<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>具有其<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor?displayProperty=nameWithType>值。

trans-unit.source: If you want your derived class to set this property, you should do so within the static constructor or in other initialization routines.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想将此属性设置在派生的类，则应这样在静态构造函数或其他初始化例程。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 初始化此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event coincides with cases where the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized" /> property changes from <see langword="false" /> (or undefined) to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized" /> 属性的值从 <see langword="false" />（或未定义）更改为 <see langword="true" /> 的情况相符。

trans-unit.source: This event will be raised whenever the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnVisualParentChanged%2A> methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 此事件将引发每当<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnVisualParentChanged%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Calls to either method could have come from application code, or through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor behavior when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page is processed.
trans-unit.target: 对任何一种方法的调用可能会从应用程序代码或通过具有出现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]处理器行为时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]页进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Whether you choose to handle <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> depends on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您选择是否处理<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>取决于你的要求。

trans-unit.source: If you do not need to read element properties, intend to reset properties, and do not need any layout information, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> might be the better event to act upon.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要读取元素属性，想要重置属性，并且不需要任何布局的信息，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>可能是更好的事件执行操作。

trans-unit.source: If you need all properties of the element to be available, and you will be setting properties that are likely to reset the layout, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> might be the better event to act upon.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要所有属性的元素可用，并且你将设置重置布局中，有可能的属性<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>可能是更好的事件执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Be careful of reentrancy if your handler resets any properties that are interpreted by the layout system to mean that a new layout pass is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的处理程序重置由布局系统，以表示新布局处理过程需要解释的任何属性，则请注意的重新进入。

trans-unit.source: (You might need to check the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> values on the property if you are unsure of which properties can require a new layout pass if they are changed.)
trans-unit.target: (你可能需要检查<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>上的属性，如果你不确定哪些属性可能需要新的布局的值传递更改时。)

trans-unit.source: For more information about the sequence of object events for a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, and also for several related application and element classes, see [Object Lifetime Events](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关序列的对象事件的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，另一些相关应用程序和元素类，请参阅和[对象生存期事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the context for input used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 使用的输入的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The input scope, which modifies how input from alternative input methods is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 解释输入范围，在该输入范围内修改从其他输入法输入的方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" /> (which results in a default handling of commands).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />（这导致对命令的默认处理）。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property inherits property values.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖属性继承属性值。

trans-unit.source: If there are child elements without other values for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A> established through local values or styles, then the property system will set the value to be the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A> value of the nearest ancestor element with this value assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果无需为其他值的子元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A>建立通过本地值或样式，则属性系统将设置此值为<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A>最近的上级元素的值与分配此值。

trans-unit.source: Although a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax usage is listed and is syntactically allowed, setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is not common.
trans-unit.target: 尽管[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语法使用情况列出和语法允许，则将此属性设置[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]并不常见。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this element has been initialized, either during processing by a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor, or by explicitly having its <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit" /> method called.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此元素是否已初始化（在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 处理器处理的过程中初始化，或通过显式调用其 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit" /> 方法进行初始化）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is initialized per the aforementioned [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processing or method calls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已通过上述 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 处理或方法调用初始化此元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property may also be `true` if this element has been moved within the logical tree such that it has a new parent element, and therefore becomes reloaded again.
trans-unit.target: 此属性也可能是`true`如果此元素已在逻辑树中以便它有一个新的父元素，并因此重新。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful if you also are using <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性很有用，如果你还使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Elements in the logical tree that is loaded by a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor are assured to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: 加载的逻辑树中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]保证处理器初始化。

trans-unit.source: Elements not in the logical tree are initialized when <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 不在逻辑树中的元素将初始化时<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: In absence of any specific handling of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A>, this will happen as soon as the constructor returns the initialized result.
trans-unit.target: 在没有任何特定的处理的情况下<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.EndInit%2A>，这将会构造函数将返回初始化的结果时，就会立即发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this element has been loaded for presentation.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已加载此元素以供呈现。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current element is attached to an element tree; <see langword="false" /> if the element has never been attached to a loaded element tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前元素被附加到元素树，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果该元素从未附加到所加载的元素树，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: From a newly constructed <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, this property starts off `false`, and remains `true` after it is set to `true`, even if the element is subsequently removed from a connected logical tree by code.
trans-unit.target: 从新构造<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，此属性开始`false`，并保留`true`设置为之后`true`，即使随后移除元素从连接的逻辑树的代码。

trans-unit.source: `true` state is set by the general presentation logic when elements are loaded into the presentation engine.
trans-unit.target: `true` 元素加载到演示文稿引擎时，将按常规表示逻辑设置状态。

trans-unit.source: Typically, loaded elements are rendered, but not all <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived classes have a presentation, and other properties such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> can influence presentation.
trans-unit.target: 通常，已加载的元素都是呈现出来，但并非所有<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>派生的类具有一个演示文稿和其他属性，如<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A>可能影响表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements two handlers: one is handling the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> event of the root element, so it is certain that the page root element is loaded because that is the significance of the event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实现两个处理程序： 一个处理<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>的根元素，从而可以确定，因为它是事件的意义加载页面根元素的事件。

trans-unit.source: The other handler is hooked to a user control, and calls <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsLoaded%2A> to assure that the root element is loaded completely.
trans-unit.target: 另一个处理程序挂钩到一个用户控件，并且调用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsLoaded%2A>以确保根元素是加载完全。

trans-unit.source: Both handlers call the same function (not shown) that will populate child elements with fresh data.
trans-unit.target: 这两个处理程序调用相同函数 （未显示），将填充并用新数据的子元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets localization/globalization language information that applies to an element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用于某个元素的本地化/全球化语言信息。

trans-unit.source: The language information for this element.
trans-unit.target: 此元素的语言信息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" /> with its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag" /> value set to the string "en-US".
trans-unit.target: 默认值是一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" />，它的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag" /> 值设置为字符串 "en-US"。

trans-unit.source: The string formats follow the RFC 3066 standard.
trans-unit.target: 字符串格式遵循 RFC 3066 标准。

trans-unit.source: For example, U.S. English is "en-US".
trans-unit.target: 例如，美国英语是"EN-US"。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the values and format, see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.
trans-unit.target: 值和格式的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property inherits property values.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖属性继承属性值。

trans-unit.source: If there are child elements without other values for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> established through local values or styles, the property system will set the value to be the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> value of the nearest ancestor element with this value assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果无需为其他值的子元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A>建立通过本地值或样式，属性系统将设置此值为<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A>最近的上级元素的值与分配此值。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] defines the general meaning of the `xml:lang` attribute.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 定义的常规含义`xml:lang`属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> essentially exposes the meaning of this attribute as a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> 实质上是公开的此属性为依赖项属性的含义。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> can be adjusted programmatically, and can participate in property system value inheritance in a way that parallels how the `xml:lang` attribute can inherit to child element scope in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> 可以以编程方式调整并且可以参与的方式，等同于属性系统值继承了`xml:lang`特性可以继承到子元素范围中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A>, that value becomes the `xml:lang` and overwrites any previous value.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A>，该值将成为`xml:lang`并覆盖任何以前的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [xml:lang Handling in XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xml-lang-handling-in-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[xml: lang 在 XAML 中处理](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xml-lang-handling-in-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a graphics transformation that should apply to this element when layout is performed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在执行布局时应该应用于此元素的图形转换方式。

trans-unit.source: The transform this element should use.
trans-unit.target: 此元素应该使用的转换。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Transform.Identity" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Transform.Identity" />。

trans-unit.source: In contrast to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> will affect results of layout.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>将影响布局的结果。

trans-unit.source: Setting a transform provides powerful capabilities of scaling and rotating.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个转换，可提供强大的功能的缩放和旋转。

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> ignores <xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform> operations.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>忽略<xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform>操作。

trans-unit.source: This is because the layout system behavior for child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> auto-corrects any offsets to the position of a scaled or rotated element into the layout and coordinate system of the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为子元素的布局系统行为<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>自动更正任何偏移量到布局的缩放或旋转元素的位置和父元素的坐标系统。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> can lead to poor application performance if you invoke it in a scenario that does not require a full pass by the layout system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> 可能导致不佳的应用程序性能，如果在方案中，不需要该布局系统的全面处理过程中调用它。

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>, it triggers a new pass by the layout system and forces all on-screen objects to be remeasured and rearranged.
trans-unit.target: 当你将<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>，它将触发一个新的传递布局系统和强制屏幕上的所有对象重新度量和重新排列。

trans-unit.source: If you are updating the complete application [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], this functionality might be exactly what you need.
trans-unit.target: 如果你要更新完整的应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，此功能可能有且仅你的需要。

trans-unit.source: However, if you do not need a full layout pass, use the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A> property, which does not invoke the layout system, and therefore, is typically a better choice for this scenario.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果不需要完整的布局处理过程，使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A>属性，而不会调用该布局系统，因此，通常是更好的选择对于此方案。

trans-unit.source: Example scenarios where <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> would be useful include: rotating elements such as menu components from horizontal to vertical or vice versa, scaling elements (zooming in) on focus, providing editing behavior, etc.
trans-unit.target: 示例方案其中<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>会有用包括： 旋转元素菜单组件从水平方向为垂直或者反之亦然，如缩放 （放大） 的元素上焦点时，提供编辑行为，等等。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to apply a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> to an element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将应用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>的元素。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and hosts it within a parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建的实例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>并将它宿主在父<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> property to apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 它还使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>属性，将应用<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the element is laid out, rendered, and ready for interaction.
trans-unit.target: 当对元素进行布局、呈现，且可将其用于交互时发生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> is usually the last event raised in an element initialization sequence.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> 通常的最后一个事件中引发元素初始化序列。

trans-unit.source: It will always be raised after <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>.
trans-unit.target: 始终将后引发<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>。

trans-unit.source: Whether you choose to handle <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> depends on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您选择是否处理<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>取决于你的要求。

trans-unit.source: If you do not need to read element properties, intend to reset properties, and do not need any layout information, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> might be the better event to act upon.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要读取元素属性，想要重置属性，并且不需要任何布局的信息，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>可能是更好的事件执行操作。

trans-unit.source: If you need all properties of the element to be available, and you will be setting properties that are likely to reset the layout, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> might be the better event to act upon.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要所有属性的元素可用，并且你将设置重置布局中，有可能的属性<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>可能是更好的事件执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Be careful of reentrancy if your handler resets any properties that are interpreted by the layout system to mean that a new layout pass is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的处理程序重置由布局系统，以表示新布局处理过程需要解释的任何属性，则请注意的重新进入。

trans-unit.source: (You might need to check the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> values on the property if you are unsure of which properties can require a new layout pass if they are changed.)
trans-unit.target: (你可能需要检查<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>上的属性，如果你不确定哪些属性可能需要新的布局的值传递更改时。)

trans-unit.source: For more information about the sequence of object events for a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, and also for several related application and element classes, see [Object Lifetime Events](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关序列的对象事件的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，另一些相关应用程序和元素类，请参阅和[对象生存期事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md)。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do not follow a route, they are only handled within the same element on which they are raised.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件不遵循路由，而仅处理引发它们时对同一元素中。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do support other routed event behavior: they support an accessible handlers collection, and can be used as an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件是否支持其他路由的事件行为： 它们支持的可访问的处理程序集合，并可用作<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>样式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded> might both be raised on controls as a result of user-initiated system theme changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> 和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded>可能同时会引发在用户启动的系统主题更改控件上。

trans-unit.source: A theme change causes an invalidation of the control template and the contained visual tree, which in turn causes the entire control to unload and reload.
trans-unit.target: 主题更改会导致控件模板和包含的可视化树，这反过来会导致整个控件，若要卸载并重新加载的失效。

trans-unit.source: Therefore <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> cannot be assumed to occur only when a page is first loaded through navigation to the page.
trans-unit.target: 因此<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>无法假定发生仅当页面首次加载通过导航到页。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Direct
trans-unit.target: 直接

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: 委托

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for logical child elements of this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此元素的逻辑子元素的一个枚举器。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for logical child elements of this element.
trans-unit.target: 此元素的逻辑子元素的一个枚举数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LogicalChildren%2A> allows you to iterate over child elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LogicalChildren%2A> 可以循环访问子元素。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for elements that may not have a defined, dedicated collection but still contain more than one child element, particularly <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> child elements.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于元素可能不具有已定义的专用集合，但仍包含多个子元素，特别<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>子元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LogicalChildren%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.AddLogicalChild%2A>, see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息如何使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LogicalChildren%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.AddLogicalChild%2A>，请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the outer margin of an element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素的外边距。

trans-unit.source: Provides margin values for the element.
trans-unit.target: 提供元素的边距值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" /> with all properties equal to 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 默认值是所有属性都等于 0（零）的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" />。

trans-unit.source: The margin is the space between this element and other elements that will be adjacent when layout creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 边距是此元素与布局创建时，将相邻其他元素之间的空间[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Shared elements might be peer elements (such as other elements in the collection of a common parent control), or might also be this element's parent.
trans-unit.target: 共享的元素可能是对等元素 （如公共的父控件的集合中的其他元素），或者也可能是此元素的父级。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A> is set as a <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> structure rather than as a number so that the margin can be set asymmetrically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A> 设置为<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>结构而不是数字的形式，以便非对称设置边距。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> structure itself supports string type conversion so that you can specify an asymmetric <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attribute syntax also.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Thickness>结构本身支持字符串类型转换，以便你可以指定非对称<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A>中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]还属性语法。

trans-unit.source: A non-zero margin applies space outside the element layout's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非零边距适用元素布局的外部空间<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Margins are additive for sibling elements in a layout; for example, two adjacent elements both with a margin of 30 set on the adjoining edge would have 60 units of space between them.
trans-unit.target: 边距的同级元素在布局中; 累加性例如，它们都具有边距为 30 相连的边缘设置的两个相邻元素将具有 60 之间的距离单位。

trans-unit.source: Elements that have margins set will not typically constrain the size of the specified <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A> if the allotted rectangle space is not large enough for the margin plus the element content area.
trans-unit.target: 不会设置边距的元素将通常限制指定的大小<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A>分配的矩形空间是否不足够大小以容纳边距加上元素的内容区域。

trans-unit.source: The element content area will be constrained instead when layout is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 计算布局时，将改为约束元素内容区域。

trans-unit.source: The only case where margins would be constrained also is if the content is already constrained all the way to zero.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的情形进行约束边距也是如果内容已被约束到零。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *left, top, right, bottom*
trans-unit.target: *左、 上、 右、 下*

trans-unit.source: Number values between 0 and <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity> that specify the four possible dimension properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> structure.
trans-unit.target: 0 之间的数字值和<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>指定四个可能的维度属性<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>结构。

trans-unit.source: The attribute usage will also accept abbreviated values that apply in the order provided, symmetrically and logically.
trans-unit.target: 属性用法还将接受缩写应用中提供，对称而符合逻辑的顺序的值。

trans-unit.source: For instance, `Margin="20"` will be interpreted to mean a <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> with all properties set to 20.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Margin="20"`将解释为表示<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>其所有属性都设置为 20。

trans-unit.source: `Margin="20,50"` will be interpreted to mean a <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> with <xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Left%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Right%2A> set to 20, and <xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Top%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Bottom%2A> set to 50.
trans-unit.target: `Margin="20,50"` 将解释为表示<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>与<xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Left%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Right%2A>设置为 20，和<xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Top%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Thickness.Bottom%2A>设置为 50。

trans-unit.source: The default unit for a <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> measure is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 默认单位<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>度量值是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify other units by appending the unit type strings `cm`, `in`, or `pt` to any measure.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以指定其他单位，通过追加单位类型字符串`cm`， `in`，或`pt`到任何度量值。

trans-unit.source: Number values provided as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attributes need not specify decimal points (0 is acceptable, does not have to be provided as 0.0).
trans-unit.target: 数字值作为提供[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]属性不需要指定位小数 （0 是可以接受的不需要提供作为 0.0)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage, see <xref:System.Windows.Thickness>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用情况，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>。

trans-unit.source: *thicknessReference*
trans-unit.target: *thicknessReference*

trans-unit.source: An object reference to an existing <xref:System.Windows.Thickness>.
trans-unit.target: 对现有的对象引用<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>。

trans-unit.source: This might be a `}`, a , or `}` reference.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是`}`、 a，或`}`引用。

trans-unit.source: For more information on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage, see <xref:System.Windows.Thickness>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用情况，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum height constraint of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素的最大高度约束。

trans-unit.source: The maximum height of the element, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 元素的最大高度，单位是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />。

trans-unit.source: This value can be any value equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以是等于或大于 0.0 的任何值。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> is also valid.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> 也有效。

trans-unit.source: This is one of three properties on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that specify height information.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个三个属性上<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>用于指定高度信息。

trans-unit.source: The other two are <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 另外两个是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If there is a conflict between these values, the order of application for actual height determination is first <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A> must be honored, then <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>, and finally if each of these are within bounds, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些值之间没有冲突，确定高度的实际的应用程序的顺序是第一个<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>必须采用，然后<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>，最后每个都在限制之内，如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value restrictions on the <xref:System.Double> value are enforced by a <xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback> mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 对的值限制<xref:System.Double>由强制执行值<xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback>机制。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set an invalid value a run-time exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置一个无效值会引发一个运行时异常。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *double*
trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式<xref:System.Double>等于或大于 0.0 的值。

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 它被解释为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字符串不需要显式包括位小数。

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值的`1`是可以接受的。

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply, except that you must use [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md) if you need to explicitly set the value to be <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>.
trans-unit.target: 相同<xref:System.Double>应用范围限制在属性值部分所述，只不过你必须使用[X:static 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)你是否需要显式设置此值为<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble*
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble*

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*该值，上文所述跟以下单位声明字符串之一： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （默认值） 是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in==96px
trans-unit.target: `in` 为英寸;1 英寸 = = 96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px
`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum width constraint of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素的最大宽度约束。

trans-unit.source: The maximum width of the element, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 元素的最大宽度，单位是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />。

trans-unit.source: This value can be any value equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以是等于或大于 0.0 的任何值。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> is also valid.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> 也有效。

trans-unit.source: This is one of three properties on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that specify width information.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个三个属性上<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>指定宽度的信息。

trans-unit.source: The other two are <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 另外两个是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If there is a conflict between these values, the order of application for actual width determination is first <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A> must be honored, then <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>, and finally if each of these are within bounds, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些值之间没有冲突，应用程序实际宽度确定的顺序是： 首先<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A>必须采用，然后<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>，最后每个都在限制之内，如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value restrictions on the <xref:System.Double> value are enforced by a <xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback> mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 对的值限制<xref:System.Double>由强制执行值<xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback>机制。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set an invalid value, a run-time exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置一个无效值，则会引发一个运行时异常。

trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.target: `px` （默认值） 是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The available size that the parent element can give to the child elements.
trans-unit.target: 父元素可以赋予子元素的可用大小。

trans-unit.source: Implements basic measure-pass layout system behavior for <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 的基本测量处理过程布局系统行为。

trans-unit.source: The desired size of this element in layout.
trans-unit.target: 此元素在布局中的所需大小。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to connect the WPF core-level and WPF framework-level layout measure implementations.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>连接的 WPF 核心级别和 WPF 框架级别布局度量值实现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> implementation seals the method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>实现会对该方法。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the measure pass layout behavior of any element that builds on the WPF framework-level, override <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整的 WPF 框架级别生成任何元素的度量传递布局行为，重写<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>相反。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the measure pass layout behavior of an element that deliberately does not build on the WPF framework-level or use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整度量值，将传递以防出现故意不会在 WPF 框架级别上生成或使用的元素的布局行为<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，重写<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The available size that this element can give to child elements.
trans-unit.target: 此元素可提供给子元素的可用大小。

trans-unit.source: Infinity can be specified as a value to indicate that the element will size to whatever content is available.
trans-unit.target: 可指定无穷大作为一个值，该值指示元素将调整到适应内容的大小。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, measures the size in layout required for child elements and determines a size for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />-derived class.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，请测量子元素在布局中所需的大小，然后确定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 派生类的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size that this element determines it needs during layout, based on its calculations of child element sizes.
trans-unit.target: 此元素基于其对子元素大小的计算确定它在布局期间所需要的大小。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A> to implement custom layout sizing behavior for your element as it participates in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] layout system.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>实现您的元素的自定义布局大小调整行为参与[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]布局系统。

trans-unit.source: Your implementation should do the following:
trans-unit.target: 您的实现应执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Iterate your element's particular collection of children that are part of layout, call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> on each child element.
trans-unit.target: 循环的布局，调用的一部分的子级的元素的特定集合<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>每个子元素上。

trans-unit.source: Immediately get <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A> on the child (this is set as a property after <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called).
trans-unit.target: 立即获取<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>对子 (这将设置为一个属性后<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>称为)。

trans-unit.source: Compute the net desired size of the parent based upon the measurement of the child elements.
trans-unit.target: 计算所需的基于测量到的子元素的父净大小。

trans-unit.source: The return value of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A> should be the element's own desired size, which then becomes the measure input for the parent element of the current element.
trans-unit.target: 返回值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>应为元素自身的所需大小，随后将成为当前元素的父元素的输入的度量值。

trans-unit.source: This same process continues through the layout system until the root element of the page is reached.
trans-unit.target: 这一过程继续通过该布局系统，直到达到页的根元素。

trans-unit.source: During this process, child elements might return a larger <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A> size than the initial `availableSize` to indicate that the child element wants more space.
trans-unit.target: 在此过程中，子元素可能会返回较大<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>大小大于初始`availableSize`指示子元素想更多空间。

trans-unit.source: This might be handled in your own implementation by introducing a scrollable region, by resizing the parent control, by establishing some manner of stacked order, or any number of solutions for measuring or arranging content.
trans-unit.target: 引入了可滚动区域，在调整父控件中，通过某种方式堆叠顺序或任意数量的解决方案来测量或排列内容，可能会在您自己的实现中处理此。

trans-unit.source: Elements should call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> on each child during this process, otherwise the child elements will not be correctly sized or arranged.
trans-unit.target: 元素应调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>在每个在此过程中的子活动，否则为子元素不会正确调整大小或排列。

trans-unit.source: The following non-compiling code shows this implementation pattern.
trans-unit.target: 下面的非编译代码演示此实现模式。

trans-unit.source: <c>VisualChildren</c> represents an enumerable collection property of children that your own element should define.
trans-unit.target: <c>VisualChildren</c>表示应定义您自己的元素的子级的可枚举集合属性。

trans-unit.source: The property can be named anything.
trans-unit.target: 属性可以命名任何内容。

trans-unit.source: <c>VisualChildren</c> is a placeholder name for purposes of this example, <c>VisualChildren</c> is not an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] as provided by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] or a part of a naming pattern..
trans-unit.target: <c>VisualChildren</c>是此示例中的占位符名称<c>VisualChildren</c>不[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]因为由提供[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]或命名模式的一部分...

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum height constraint of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素的最小高度约束。

trans-unit.source: The minimum height of the element, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 元素的最小高度，单位是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.0。

trans-unit.source: This value can be any value equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以是等于或大于 0.0 的任何值。

trans-unit.source: However, <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> is NOT valid, nor is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> 无效，<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" /> 也无效。

trans-unit.source: This is one of three properties on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that specify height information.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个三个属性上<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>用于指定高度信息。

trans-unit.source: The other two are <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 另外两个是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If there is a conflict between these values, the order of application for actual height determination is first <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A> must be honored, then <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>, and finally if each of these are within bounds, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些值之间没有冲突，确定高度的实际的应用程序的顺序是第一个<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>必须采用，然后<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>，最后每个都在限制之内，如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value restrictions on the <xref:System.Double> value are enforced by a <xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback> mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 对的值限制<xref:System.Double>由强制执行值<xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback>机制。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set an invalid value, a run-time exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置一个无效值，则会引发一个运行时异常。
