trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route.
trans-unit.target: 子类<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。

trans-unit.source: One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.
trans-unit.target: 一个可能的方案是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理以缩短路由。

trans-unit.source: The old parent element.
trans-unit.target: 旧的父元素。

trans-unit.source: May be <see langword="null" /> to indicate that the element did not have a visual parent previously.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 <see langword="null" />，指示元素未曾有过可视化父级。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the parent of this element in the visual tree is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当此元素父级在可视化树中发生更改时进行了调用。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.OnVisualParentChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.OnVisualParentChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />。

trans-unit.source: The visual tree is potentially different from the logical tree because it omits elements that do not render visually, such as collections, and expands some elements on the basis of their theme and style compositing.
trans-unit.target: 可视化树是不同于逻辑树，因为它无法不例如集合、 直观地呈现的元素，并且展开某些元素根据其主题和样式的组合。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见 [WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this virtual method queries for the new parent, raises various initialization events, and sets internal flags about initialization state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 此虚方法的默认实现中查询的新父级、 引发各种初始化事件，并将内部标志设置有关初始化状态的<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />根据。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it calls the successive base implementations as declared by <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />, which in turn calls its base in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />.
trans-unit.target: 最后，它调用的连续的基实现所声明的<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />，从而又会调用其基类<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />。

trans-unit.source: Always call the base implementation to preserve this behavior, otherwise the element tree behavior for this element when declared as a child of another element may not be as expected.
trans-unit.target: 始终调用基实现来保留此行为，否则此元素时声明为另一个元素的子级的元素树行为可能不按预期方式。

trans-unit.source: A few existing [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] classes override this method, for example: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Window.OnVisualParentChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.OnVisualParentChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: 少量现有[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]类重写此方法，例如： <see cref="M:System.Windows.Window.OnVisualParentChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />， <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.OnVisualParentChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />。

trans-unit.source: The most common scenario is to enforce that the new parent must be a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的方案是强制执行新的父级必须是特定的类型。

trans-unit.source: This might involve throwing an exception if the new parent failed some manner of type test.
trans-unit.target: 这样做可能会引发异常，如果新的父项无法通过某种方式类型测试。

trans-unit.source: A specialized version of this scenario exists in implementations for list items and menu items, which do not make any sense outside a parent visual that owns an appropriate collection to store them in.
trans-unit.target: 在实现中的列表项和菜单项，其中没有意义任何外部父 visual 拥有正确的集合以将它们存储在存在这种情况下的专用的版本。

trans-unit.source: Note that these cases do not necessarily raise exceptions, because there might be designer scenarios that rely on reparenting elements that are momentarily without their "regular" parents.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这种情况下不一定会引发异常，因为可能存在依赖于重新设置父级即暂时没有其"常规"的父级的元素的设计器方案。

trans-unit.source: This method is also overridden in certain elements that are typically the root element, such as <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法还在某些元素，通常是根元素，如<see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />。

trans-unit.source: Another case is elements that are the apparent root element in markup but which autogenerate a greater infrastructure in a compiled logical tree (such as <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Page" />).
trans-unit.target: 另一种是中标记但明显的根元素的元素自动生成已编译的逻辑树中的更高版本的基础结构 (如<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Page" />)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Page" /> implementations deliberately seal the method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />和<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Page" />实现特意密封此方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this element incorporates style properties from theme styles.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此元素是否并入主题样式中的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element does not use theme style properties; all style-originating properties come from local application styles, and theme style properties do not apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素不使用主题样式属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；所有源于样式的属性均来自本地应用程序样式，不会应用主题样式属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if application styles apply first, and then theme styles apply for properties that were not specifically set in application styles.
trans-unit.target: 如果首先应用了应用程序样式，然后将主题样式应用于未在应用程序样式中专门设置的属性，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The most common usage of this property is an indirect usage within the setter of a style that is supplying a themed style.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的最常见用法是一种间接使用正提供主题样式的样式的 setter 中。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OverridesDefaultStyle%2A> to `true` on a control, you will be suppressing the default control template supplied by the theme styles.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OverridesDefaultStyle%2A>到`true`控件，则会禁用主题样式所提供的默认控件模板。

trans-unit.source: That control template typically includes the content presenter and other composited elements that provide basic [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] functionality and visualization for the control.
trans-unit.target: 该控件模板通常包含内容的显示器和提供基本其他复合元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]功能和控件的可视化效果。

trans-unit.source: If you want the control to continue to support the same features as the default theme styles, you must supply an alternate style with a control template that replicates the same structure.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要继续支持与默认主题样式相同的功能的控件，你必须提供替代样式与复制相同的结构的控件模板。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Control Authoring Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[控件创作概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OverridesDefaultStyle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OverridesDefaultStyle" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the logical parent element of this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此元素的逻辑父元素。

trans-unit.source: This element's logical parent.
trans-unit.target: 此元素的逻辑父级。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> may be `null` in cases where an element was instantiated, but is not attached to any logical tree that eventually connects to the page level root element, or the application object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> 可能是`null`情况下，元素已实例化，但未附加到任何最终将连接到的页级别的根元素或应用程序对象的逻辑树中。

trans-unit.source: Note that the logical parent of an element can potentially change depending on your application's functionality, and keeping the value of this property will not reflect that change.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，根据你的应用程序的功能，可能发生更改的元素的逻辑父级，并且此属性的值保持将不会反映所做的更改。

trans-unit.source: You typically should get the value immediately before you need it.
trans-unit.target: 你需要它之前，你通常应获取的值。

trans-unit.source: See [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md) for more information about logical tree traversal, and the scenarios where using <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> as a technique of parent element discovery is appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)逻辑树遍历，有关详细信息和方案，使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A>发现适合用作父元素的技术。

trans-unit.source: The property engine will potentially recalculate all property values of an element when it is reparented, because some properties inherit values through the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 属性引擎将可能重新计算此元素的所有属性值时父级，因为某些属性继承值通过逻辑树。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> that applies for bindings can also change when elements are reparented.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>适用于元素是父级，还可以更改绑定。

trans-unit.source: Changing an element's parent is typically only done through manipulation of collections, by using dedicated add or remove methods, or through setting content properties of elements.
trans-unit.target: 更改元素的父通常只是对集合的操作，通过使用专用添加或删除方法，或通过设置的元素的内容属性。

trans-unit.source: The most typical scenario for using the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> property is to obtain a reference and then get various <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> property values from the parent.
trans-unit.target: 使用最典型的情形<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A>属性是获得的引用，然后获取各种<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>从父属性值。

trans-unit.source: For templates, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> of the template eventually will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 对于模板，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A>模板的最终将`null`。

trans-unit.source: To get past this point and extend into the logical tree where the template is actually applied, use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要忽略这一点并扩展到实际将应用的模板的逻辑树，请使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property does not report visual tree parents in cases where these vary from the logical tree parents.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此属性不会报告在其中而这些变化从逻辑树父的情况下的可视化树父级。

trans-unit.source: Visual tree parents are not typically important for general application cases but may be the desired parent elements for certain visual level cases.
trans-unit.target: 可视化树的父项不是为常规应用程序的情况下通常很重要，但可能会某些可视化级别情况所需的父元素。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows code that checks for an element's parent, and then uses property values from the parent to set properties on the child element to match.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示代码检查某个元素的父级，然后使用从父属性值在要匹配的子元素上设置属性。

trans-unit.source: In this case these are properties that affect the rendering size.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，这些是影响呈现大小的属性。

trans-unit.source: The child element reporting the change.
trans-unit.target: 报告更改的子元素。

trans-unit.source: Supports incremental layout implementations in specialized subclasses of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 的专用子类中支持增量布局实现。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ParentLayoutInvalidated(System.Windows.UIElement)" /> is invoked when a child element has invalidated a property that is marked in metadata as affecting the parent's measure or arrange passes during layout.
trans-unit.target: 如果子元素包含无效属性，且该属性在元数据中标记为影响布局过程中父元素的测量或排列过程的因素，则调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ParentLayoutInvalidated(System.Windows.UIElement)" />。

trans-unit.source: If this element has a child element on which some property was invalidated and the property was marked as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsParentMeasure%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsParentArrange%2A> in property metadata during registration, this method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素具有子元素在其某些属性已失效，并且该属性被标记为<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsParentMeasure%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsParentArrange%2A>在注册期间的属性元数据，会调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The method invocation notifies the parent element which particular child element must be re-measured if this element supports partial (incremental) update of layout.
trans-unit.target: 方法调用将通知的特定子元素必须是重新测量，如果此元素支持部分 （增量） 更新的布局的父元素。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> does not support incremental layout, and in the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> class this method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>不支持增量布局，然后在<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>这类方法具有没有默认实现。

trans-unit.source: The scenario where overriding this method would be necessary is not common, because it requires you to modify the default layout system behavior.
trans-unit.target: 将需要重写此方法的方案并不常用，因为它需要修改默认布局系统行为。

trans-unit.source: An example implementation scenario might be if a class had type limitations for possible child elements that are significantly more restrictive than the WPF framework-level layout system.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现方案示例可能是一个类包含可能存在的子元素的显著比 WPF 框架级别布局系统限制性更强的类型限制。

trans-unit.source: Because of the nature of these custom elements, property changes could be deliberately deferred when you implement some custom layout behavior.
trans-unit.target: 由于这些自定义元素的特性，可能有意推迟属性更改时实现一些自定义布局的行为。

trans-unit.source: For instance, measure/arrange method overrides, which try to optimize the child element render pass, could be deferred for certain types of changes that would ordinarily result in another layout pass.
trans-unit.target: 例如，/排列度量值的方法重写，则尝试优化子元素呈现处理过程，可能对某些类型的更改通常会生成另一个布局处理过程中被推迟。

trans-unit.source: The direction for which a prospective focus change should be determined.
trans-unit.target: 应确定其预期焦点更改的方向。

trans-unit.source: Determines the next element that would receive focus relative to this element for a provided focus movement direction, but does not actually move the focus.
trans-unit.target: 根据提供的焦点移动方向，确定在此元素之后接收焦点的下一个元素，但不实际移动焦点。

trans-unit.source: The next element that focus would move to if focus were actually traversed.
trans-unit.target: 如果实际遍历了焦点，则为焦点将要移到的下一个元素。

trans-unit.source: May return <see langword="null" /> if focus cannot be moved relative to this element for the provided direction.
trans-unit.target: 如果焦点不能按提供的方向相对于此元素移动，则可能返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> is the related method that actually does move focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> 是实际移动焦点的相关的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a handler that handles several possible button inputs, each button representing a possible <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实现一个处理程序以处理多个可能的按钮输入，表示可能发生的每个按钮<xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>。

trans-unit.source: The handler tracks the element with current keyboard focus, and calls <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.PredictFocus%2A> on that element, and specifies the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection> as initialization for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest> type parameter provided.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序将跟踪与当前的键盘焦点，并调用元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.PredictFocus%2A>上该元素，并指定相应<xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>初始化<xref:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest>类型提供的参数。

trans-unit.source: Instead of moving to that element as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> would do, the handler changes the physical dimensions of the predicted focus destination for visualization purposes.
trans-unit.target: 而不是移动到为该元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A>一样，该处理程序更改可视化效果目的的预测的焦点目标的物理尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Specified one of the following directions in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest" />: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Next" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Previous" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.First" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Last" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest" /> 中指定了以下方向之一：<see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Next" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Previous" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.First" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Last" />。

trans-unit.source: These directions are not legal for <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.PredictFocus(System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection)" /> (but they are legal for <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus(System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest)" />).
trans-unit.target: 对于 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.PredictFocus(System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection)" /> 来说，这些方向是非法的（但对于 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus(System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest)" /> 来说是合法的）。

trans-unit.source: Name to use for the specified name-object mapping.
trans-unit.target: 要在指定的名称-对象映射中使用的名称。

trans-unit.source: Object for the mapping.
trans-unit.target: 映射的对象。

trans-unit.source: Provides an accessor that simplifies access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.NameScope" /> registration method.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个可简化对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.NameScope" /> 注册方法访问的访问器。

trans-unit.source: This method is a convenience method for calling <xref:System.Windows.NameScope.RegisterName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是调用的便捷方法<xref:System.Windows.NameScope.RegisterName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The implementation will check successive parent elements until it finds the applicable <xref:System.Windows.NameScope> implementation, which is found by finding an element that implements <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>.
trans-unit.target: 该实现将检查连续的父元素，直到它找到适用<xref:System.Windows.NameScope>实现，它可以通过查找元素实现<xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about namescopes, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关名称范围的详细信息，请参阅[WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RegisterName%2A> is necessary in order to correctly hook up animation storyboards for applications when created in code.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RegisterName%2A>为正确挂钩的应用程序时在代码中创建动画演示图板是必需的。

trans-unit.source: This is because one of the key storyboard properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName%2A>, uses a run-time name lookup instead of being able to take a reference to a target element.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为其中一个主要情节提要属性， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName%2A>，而不是能够充分目标元素的引用中使用运行时名称查找。

trans-unit.source: This is true even if that element is accessible by reference from the code.
trans-unit.target: 即使该元素是可访问的代码中的引用，也是如此。

trans-unit.source: For more information on why you need to register names for storyboard targets, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 为何需要注册名称的情节提要目标的详细信息，请参阅[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The element to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的元素。

trans-unit.source: Removes the provided object from this element's logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 从此元素的逻辑树中删除所提供的对象。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> updates the affected logical tree parent pointers to keep in sync with this deletion.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 将更新受影响的逻辑树父级指针，以便与此删除操作保持同步。

trans-unit.source: Use this method for the implementation of collections on objects that represent logical children of an element.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法用于实现的上表示逻辑子级的元素的对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: This might be done in property getters or setters, class handlers of `Changed` events, constructors, or within the collection types themselves.
trans-unit.target: 属性 getter 或 setter 中的类处理程序可以采取这`Changed`事件、 构造函数，或在集合类型本身。

trans-unit.source: For control authors, manipulating the logical tree at this level is not the recommended practice, unless none of the provided base control class' content models are appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 对于控件作者操作在此级别的逻辑树不是建议的做法，除非没有合适的提供基控件类的内容模型。

trans-unit.source: Consider subclassing at the level of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 请考虑级别的子类化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: These classes provide a content model with particular enforcement of logical children through dedicated [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)], as well as support for other features typically desirable in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] control such as styling through templates.
trans-unit.target: 这些类提供的内容模型通过专用的逻辑子级的特定强制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]，以及对其他功能中通常所需的支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]控件如通过模板的样式。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a `Child` property on a custom <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that does its own visual layer implementation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实现`Child`的自定义属性<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>执行其自己的可视化层实现。

trans-unit.source: The property's setter is designed so that if the value changes, the old value is removed from the logical tree, as well as a class-specific visual collection.
trans-unit.target: 属性的 setter 的设计目的，因此如果值发生更改，从逻辑树中，以及特定于类的可视集合中删除旧值。

trans-unit.source: The values are cached, and then the new value is added to both the standard WPF framework level logical tree and the custom visual collection.
trans-unit.target: 将缓存这些值，并随后将新值添加到标准 WPF 框架级别逻辑树和自定义的可视集合。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView(System.Windows.Rect)" /> is called on this element.
trans-unit.target: 当在此元素上调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView(System.Windows.Rect)" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event indicates to a parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> (or derived class) that the element that raises the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView> event should be made visible within the scrollable region.
trans-unit.target: 此事件指示： 对于父级<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>（或派生类），引发元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>事件应要使其可见的可滚动区域内。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will then mark the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView> event as handled, by using class handling of the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>然后会将标记<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>为已处理，通过使用类处理的事件的事件。

trans-unit.source: In general <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView> event data should not be marked handled by any class that does control a scrolling region, or by any instance handler, because doing so would interfere with the intended goal of the element that called <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>事件数据不应将标记通过控制滚动区域，任何类或任何处理实例处理程序，因为这样会妨碍其预期目标调用的元素是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: 冒泡

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: 委托

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the locally-defined resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置本地定义的资源字典。

trans-unit.source: The current locally-defined dictionary of resources, where each resource can be accessed by key.
trans-unit.target: 资源中当前本地定义的字典，其中的每个资源均可通过键进行访问。

trans-unit.source: Resource dictionaries that can be defined completely or partially in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] are typically created as a property element, and are typically on the root element for any individual page or for the application.
trans-unit.target: 可以完全或部分中定义的资源字典[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通常创建为一个属性元素，并且通常是根元素为任何单个页面或应用程序上。

trans-unit.source: Placing the resource dictionary at this level makes it easier to find from individual child elements in the page (or from any page, in the application case).
trans-unit.target: 将在此级别的资源字典便于查找从页面中的各个子元素 （或任何页上，在应用程序的情况下）。

trans-unit.source: In most application scenarios, we recommend that styles be defined as object elements within a resource dictionary, or be defined as external resources so that the entire style resource can be self-contained (this approach helps separate designer responsibilities from developer responsibilities by separating the physical files that need to be edited).
trans-unit.target: 在大多数应用程序方案中，我们建议作为对象元素使用的资源字典中定义样式或作为外部资源定义整个样式资源可以是自包含 （此方法有助于单独的设计器从开发人员通过将需要编辑物理文件分开的责任职责）。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property returns only the resource dictionary declared directly within that element.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此属性返回直接在该元素内声明仅的资源字典。

trans-unit.source: This is different than the actual resource lookup process, where a child element can access any of the resources defined in each parent element, searching recursively upwards.
trans-unit.target: 此函数不同于实际资源查找过程中，子元素可以访问任何向上递归搜索每个父元素中定义的资源。

trans-unit.source: Resources can also be referenced by code from within the collection, but be aware that resources created in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will definitely not be accessible until after <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> is raised by the element that declares the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 资源在集合中，从代码也可以引用，但请注意资源创建在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]肯定不可访问，直到<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>引起声明该字典的元素。

trans-unit.source: In fact, resources are parsed asynchronously and not even the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> event is an assurance that you can reference a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] defined resource.
trans-unit.target: 以异步方式而不分析资源的实际上，即使<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>事件是保证可引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]定义资源。

trans-unit.source: For this reason you should generally only access [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] defined resources as part of run-time code, or through other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] techniques such as styles or resource extension references for attribute values.
trans-unit.target: 因此你通常只应访问[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]定义资源作为的一部分运行时代码，或通过其他[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]技术，如样式或特性值的资源扩展引用。

trans-unit.source: When you access resources through code, it is essentially equivalent to a reference made from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 通过代码访问资源时，它是实质上等同于从进行的引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> supports the methods required to add, remove or query resources from within the collection by using code.
trans-unit.target: 基础<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>支持添加、 删除或通过使用代码查询从集合中的资源所需的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources%2A> property is settable to support the scenario of completely replacing the resources collection of an element to be a new or different <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources%2A>属性是可以设置以支持以下场景： 完全替换的元素为一个新的或不同的资源集合<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax shown does not include an element for the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]所示的语法不包含的元素<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: This is an example of implicit collection syntax; a tag representing the collection element can be omitted.
trans-unit.target: 这是隐式集合语法; 一个示例可以省略表示集合元素的标记。

trans-unit.source: The elements that are added as items to the collection are specified instead.
trans-unit.target: 改为指定为项添加到集合的元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about implicit collections and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关隐式集合的详细信息和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，请参阅[在详细信息的 XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。

trans-unit.source: One case where a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> is still specified explicitly as an element is if you are introducing a merged dictionary, in which case there are typically no child elements for that <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 一种情况下其中<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>仍显式指定引入合并的字典，这种情况下是否存在通常没有子元素，该元素原样<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[合并资源字典](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreResourceElements*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreResourceElements*

trans-unit.source: One or more object elements, each of which defines a resource.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个对象元素，其中每个定义的资源。

trans-unit.source: Each resource property element within each <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> must have a unique value for the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md), which serves as the unique key when values are retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 在每个每个资源属性元素<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>必须具有唯一值[X:key 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)，它用作唯一键时将从检索值<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: Attaches a binding to this element for the specified dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的依赖属性向此元素附加一个绑定。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the destination property where the binding should be established.
trans-unit.target: 标识应该建立绑定的目标属性。

trans-unit.source: The source property name or the path to the property used for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 源属性名称或用于绑定的属性的路径。

trans-unit.source: Attaches a binding to this element, based on the provided source property name as a path qualification to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 将提供的源属性名作为数据源的路径限定，从而将绑定附加到此元素上。

trans-unit.source: Records the conditions of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 记录绑定的条件。

trans-unit.source: This return value can be useful for error checking.
trans-unit.target: 此返回值可用于错误检查。

trans-unit.source: This method is a convenience method for calling <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.SetBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which passes the current instance as the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>, and creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> based on the provided `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是调用的便捷方法<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.SetBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，后者将当前实例作为传递<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>，并创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>根据所提供`path`参数。

trans-unit.source: This signature is more convenient if you are establishing a simple default binding.
trans-unit.target: 此签名会更方便，当您要建立简单的默认绑定。

trans-unit.source: If you need to specify any binding properties to non-default conditions, or want to use a <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>,you should use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SetBinding%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Data.BindingBase%29> signature.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要指定任何绑定属性为非默认条件，或想要使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>，应使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SetBinding%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Data.BindingBase%29>签名。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets a binding using a specific path.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置使用特定路径的绑定。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property where the binding should be established.
trans-unit.target: 标识应在其中建立绑定的属性。

trans-unit.source: Represents the specifics of the data binding.
trans-unit.target: 表示数据绑定的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Attaches a binding to this element, based on the provided binding object.
trans-unit.target: 基于已提供的绑定对象将一个绑定附加到此元素上。

trans-unit.source: Records the conditions of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 记录绑定的条件。

trans-unit.source: This return value can be useful for error checking.
trans-unit.target: 此返回值可用于错误检查。

trans-unit.source: This method is a convenience method for calling <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.SetBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which passes the current instance as the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是调用的便捷方法<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.SetBinding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，后者将当前实例作为传递<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>。

trans-unit.source: The element that specifies a flow direction.
trans-unit.target: 指定流方向的元素。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration, specifying the direction.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值，用于指定方向。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection" /> attached property for the provided element.
trans-unit.target: 设置所提供元素的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection" /> 附加属性的值。

trans-unit.source: This method supports attached property syntax for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> property, therefore allowing child elements of a provided <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> to specify flow direction for the arrangement within their parent element.
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持的附加的属性语法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>属性，从而使子元素提供的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>指定其父元素内的排列的数据流方向。

trans-unit.source: To set the value on the current <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, use the direct [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessor <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 对当前设置的值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，使用 direct[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]访问器<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The property to which the resource is bound.
trans-unit.target: 资源绑定到的属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 资源的名称。

trans-unit.source: Searches for a resource with the specified name and sets up a resource reference to it for the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 搜索具有指定名称的资源，并且为指定的属性设置一个指向该资源的资源引用。

trans-unit.source: A resource reference is similar to the use of a [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md) in markup.
trans-unit.target: 资源引用相当于使用[DynamicResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)标记中。

trans-unit.source: The resource reference creates an internal expression that supplies the value of the specified property on a run-time deferred basis.
trans-unit.target: 资源引用创建提供根据延迟特定的运行时间的指定属性的值的内部表达式。

trans-unit.source: The expression will be re-evaluated whenever the resource dictionary indicates a changed value through internal events, or whenever the current element is reparented (a parent change would change the dictionary lookup path).
trans-unit.target: 该表达式将重新计算每当资源字典指示通过内部事件，更改的值或父级的当前元素 （父级更改会更改的字典查找路径）。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether serialization processes should serialize the contents of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示序列化过程是否应该序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources" /> 属性的内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应当序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources" /> 属性值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This will return `true` as long as there is at least one keyed resource in the local <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回`true`，只要本地没有至少一个键控的资源<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Resources%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether serialization processes should serialize the contents of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示序列化过程是否应该序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style" /> 属性的内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应当序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style" /> 属性值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This will return `true` if the <xref:System.Windows.Style> is locally set.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回`true`如果<xref:System.Windows.Style>本地设置。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether serialization processes should serialize the contents of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Triggers" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示序列化过程是否应该序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Triggers" /> 属性的内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Triggers" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应当序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Triggers" /> 属性值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` if the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Triggers%2A> property is locally set.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`true`如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Triggers%2A>本地设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when either the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight" /> or the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth" /> properties change value on this element.
trans-unit.target: 当此元素上的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth" /> 属性的值发生更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do not follow a route, they are only handled within the same element on which they are raised.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件不遵循路由，而仅处理引发它们时对同一元素中。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do support other routed event behavior: they support an accessible handlers collection, and can be used as an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件是否支持其他路由的事件行为： 它们支持的可访问的处理程序集合，并可用作<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>样式。

trans-unit.source: The layout system reads properties within the <xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedEventArgs> argument class of this event, to determine whether the reported size changes should be considered significant.
trans-unit.target: 布局系统读取属性内的<xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedEventArgs>自变量类的此事件，以确定是否应将报告的大小更改视为重要。

trans-unit.source: This allows the layout system or your control-specific layout implementations to avoid forcing a layout change due to visually imperceptible differences between old and new height or width values.
trans-unit.target: 这允许该布局系统或自己的特定于控件的布局实现不会强制执行布局更改由于直观地无法觉察旧和新的高度或宽度值之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: The imperceptible differences might be due to rounding or same-result calculations of a floating-point data types.
trans-unit.target: 无法觉察的差异可能是由于舍入或相同的结果计算的浮点数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Direct
trans-unit.target: 直接

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: 委托

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SizeChanged" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SizeChanged" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the source value changes for any existing property binding on this element.
trans-unit.target: 当此元素上的任何现有属性绑定的源值发生更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated> event that is raised by any <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated>引发任何事件<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>与此元素关联。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style used by this element when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此元素呈现时所使用的样式。

trans-unit.source: The applied, nondefault style for the element, if present.
trans-unit.target: 若存在，则为此元素适用的非默认样式。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The default for a default-constructed <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下构造的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 的默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For controls, the current style is often provided by a default style from control theming, or from styles generally applied to controls of that type by resources at page or application level (an implicit style).
trans-unit.target: 对于控件，当前的样式是通常由控件主题中的默认样式或从样式通常应用于该类型的控件在页面或应用程序级别 （隐式样式） 的资源。

trans-unit.source: This property does not set or return default (theme) styles, but it does return either an implicit style or an explicit style that is acting on the element.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不未设置或返回默认值 （主题） 样式，但它返回隐式样式或对元素执行显式样式。

trans-unit.source: In the case of implicit or explicit styles, it does not matter whether the style is specified as a resource or defined locally.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在隐式或显式样式，它并不重要的样式是指定为资源还是本地定义。

trans-unit.source: Setting the styles has some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 设置样式有一些限制。

trans-unit.source: You can reset the entire <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Windows.Style> at any time, which will force a layout recomposition.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重置整个<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>到新的属性<xref:System.Windows.Style>任何时候，这将强制布局重新组合。

trans-unit.source: However, as soon as that style is placed in use by a loaded element, the <xref:System.Windows.Style> should be considered sealed.
trans-unit.target: 但是，只要该样式加载的元素，置于使用<xref:System.Windows.Style>应视为密封。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to make a change to any individual property of an in-use style (such as anything within the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A>) causes an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 尝试对正在使用样式任何单个属性进行更改 (如在集合内的任何内容<xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A>) 将导致异常引发。

trans-unit.source: A style that is defined in markup is considered to be in use as soon as it is loaded from a resource dictionary (for resources), or the page it is contained within is loaded (for inline styles).
trans-unit.target: 在标记中定义样式被视为一旦加载从资源字典 （对于资源），或包含在页面加载 （对于内联样式），可使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> is a dependency property with special precedence.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> 是具有特殊优先级依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The locally set style generally operates at the highest precedence in the property system.
trans-unit.target: 本地设置样式通常最高优先级会在运行属性系统。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> is null at this point, during loading the property system checks for implicit styles in local or application resources that specify that type.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>期间加载属性系统检查本地或应用程序指定该类型的资源中的隐式样式在这种情况下，为 null。

trans-unit.source: If the style is still null after this step, then the acting style for presentation purposes generally comes from the default (theme) style, but the default style is not returned in the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果样式后仍 null 此步骤中，则出于演示目的的有效样式通常来自默认 （主题） 样式，但默认样式中将不返回<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: See [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md) or [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)或[样式和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。

trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: *resourceExtension*
trans-unit.target: *resourceExtension*

trans-unit.source: One of the following: , or .
trans-unit.target: 以下项之一:，或。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。

trans-unit.target: *styleResourceKey*

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: 标识所请求的样式的键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 该键引用中的现有资源<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended for most style scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 属性元素语法是从技术上讲是可行的但对于大多数样式方案不建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: 绑定引用使用或<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>也是可行的但不常见。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a style in a resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例资源字典中定义的样式。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the requested ambient property.
trans-unit.target: 请求的环境属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Markup.IQueryAmbient.IsAmbientPropertyAvailable(System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参见 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Markup.IQueryAmbient.IsAmbientPropertyAvailable(System.String)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="propertyName" /> is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="propertyName" /> 可用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IQueryAmbient> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IQueryAmbient> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an arbitrary object value that can be used to store custom information about this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置任意对象值，该值可用于存储关于此元素的自定义信息。

trans-unit.source: The intended value.
trans-unit.target: 预期值。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: This property is analogous to Tag properties in other Microsoft programming models, such as Visual Basic for Applications or Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是类似于应用程序或 Windows 窗体的 Visual Basic 等其他 Microsoft 编程模型中的标记属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Tag%2A> is intended to provide a pre-existing property location where you can store some basic custom information about any <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> without requiring you to subclass an element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Tag%2A> 旨在提供可以在其中存储有关任何一些基本自定义信息的预先存在的属性位置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>而无需你子类化元素。

trans-unit.source: Because this property takes an object, you need to use the property element usage in order to set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Tag%2A> property in XAML to anything other than an object with a known and built-in type converter, such as a string.
trans-unit.target: 因为此属性采用对象，你需要使用以设置的属性元素用法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Tag%2A>属性在 XAML 中具有已知和内置类型转换器，如字符串的对象之外的任何内容。

trans-unit.source: Objects used in this manner are typically not within the standard WPF namespaces and therefore may require namespace mapping to the external namespace in order to be introduced as XAML elements.
trans-unit.target: 在这种方式中使用的对象通常并不在标准 WPF 命名空间内，并且因此可能需要将命名空间映射到外部命名空间，才能作为 XAML 元素引入。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md) and [XAML and Custom Classes for WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-and-custom-classes-for-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)和[XAML 和 wpf 自定义类](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-and-custom-classes-for-wpf.md)。
