trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Tag" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Tag" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the target value changes for any property binding on this element.
trans-unit.target: 当此元素上的任何属性绑定的目标值发生更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated> event that is raised by any <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated>引发任何事件<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>与此元素关联。

trans-unit.source: This usually means that the binding in question is a two-way binding, and that the bound dependency property affirms that the previous property value is now invalid according to any validation or caching scheme that the property or the data source support.
trans-unit.target: 这通常意味着，所讨论的绑定是一个双向绑定，且它的绑定的依赖项属性断言是现在根据任何验证或属性或数据源所支持的缓存方案无效以前的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Use the event data of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TargetUpdated> event to determine the specific property that is reporting the target value update.
trans-unit.target: 使用事件数据的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TargetUpdated>事件，以确定报告目标值更新的特定属性。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the template parent of this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取对此元素的模板父级的引用。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant if the element was not created through a template.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素不是通过模板创建的，则此属性无关。

trans-unit.source: The element whose <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.VisualTree" /> caused this element to be created.
trans-unit.target: 元素其<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.VisualTree" />导致要创建此元素。

trans-unit.source: This value is frequently <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值通常为<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A> is frequently `null` for objects that are created in your application markup or code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A> 通常是`null`在你的应用程序标记或代码中创建的对象。

trans-unit.source: This is because you create those objects directly, not via a template.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为你的那些对象直接创建，不是通过模板。

trans-unit.source: Object references obtained by walking the logical tree from the root, or by typical name references, do not come from a template.
trans-unit.target: 对象获取通过从根，遍历逻辑树，或者典型名称引用的引用，不是来自模板。

trans-unit.source: Cases where <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A> might not be `null` include operations such as hit-testing, event handling for certain low-level input events, walking the visual tree with <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper>, or working with enumerators, which might return elements that came from templates.
trans-unit.target: 情况<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A>可能不是`null`包括操作，例如命中测试，某些低级别的输入事件，遍历与的可视化树的事件处理<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper>，或使用枚举器，这可能会返回提供的元素从模板。

trans-unit.source: Another case is if you specifically call <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A> against an existing <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate> and are work with the returned object.
trans-unit.target: 另一种是如果你明确调用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate.FindName%2A>针对现有<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate>并且使用返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: Templates are actually shared objects, where the contents of the template are created only once.
trans-unit.target: 模板是实际共享的对象，其中仅一次创建模板的内容。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you obtain an object reference to an element that came from a template, you may find that the apparent logical tree does not reach to the page root.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果你获取对来自模板的元素的对象引用，你可能会发现明显的逻辑树无法到达页面根。

trans-unit.source: In order to connect such a template reference to the page's logical tree, you should get the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A> value and continue to navigate that element tree as desired.
trans-unit.target: 若要连接到该页面的逻辑树这样的模板引用，则应获取<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent%2A>值并继续根据需要该元素树中导航。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tool-tip object that is displayed for this element in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中为此元素显示的工具提示对象。

trans-unit.source: The tooltip object.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示对象。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>, then that value is the tool-tip that will be used in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值属于类型<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>，则该值将用于工具提示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If the value is of any other type, then that value will be used as the *content* for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> provided (constructed) by the system.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为的任何其他类型，则该值将用作*内容*为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>提供 （构造） 系统。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>。

trans-unit.source: The service class provides attached properties that can be used to further customize a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: 服务类提供了可用来进一步自定义的附加的属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *toolTipContent*
trans-unit.target: *toolTipContent*

trans-unit.source: A string that becomes the display text for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 将成为显示的文本字符串<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>。

trans-unit.source: *toolTipObjectContent*
trans-unit.target: *toolTipObjectContent*

trans-unit.source: Some object, provided in object element form, that should be used as the content for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> .
trans-unit.target: 对象元素窗体，应该用作的内容中提供的某些对象<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>。

trans-unit.source: Typically this would be a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or some other element that creates layout compositing for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>, eventually containing text content within the compositing.
trans-unit.target: 通常这是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或创建的布局组合的其他某个元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>，最终包含在该组合中的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: In this usage, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> element is created implicitly from the parsed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], and the *toolTipObjectContent* content is set as its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 在这种用法，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>元素创建的隐式地从已分析[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，和*经过*内容设置为其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: <`ToolTip` .../>
trans-unit.target: <`ToolTip` .../>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> in code and then sets the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>代码，然后选择设置中<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before any tooltip on the element is closed.
trans-unit.target: 在元素上的任何工具提示关闭之前发生。

trans-unit.source: Marking the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing> event as handled does not cancel closing the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 标记<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing>为已处理的事件不会取消关闭工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Once the tooltip is displayed, closing the tooltip is done only in response to user interaction with the UI.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示显示后，关闭工具提示是仅在响应用户交互，与 UI 中完成的。

trans-unit.source: This event cannot be an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不能为<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>样式。

trans-unit.source: This is because the identifier field of this event re-uses an implementation from a service that does not expose add/remove event methods for the service-level event.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为此事件的标识符字段重新使用从服务不会公开为服务级别事件的添加/删除事件方法的实现。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Direct
trans-unit.target: 直接

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: 委托

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnToolTipClosing%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnToolTipClosing%2A>实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any tooltip on the element is opened.
trans-unit.target: 在元素上的任何工具提示打开时发生。

trans-unit.source: To prevent a tooltip from appearing in the UI, your handler for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening> can mark the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipEventArgs> event data handled.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免出现在 UI 中，您的处理程序的工具提示<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening>可以将标记<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipEventArgs>所处理的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the tooltip is displayed, using the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A> property as the tooltip content.
trans-unit.target: 否则，显示工具提示，使用的值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>属性作为工具提示的内容。

trans-unit.source: Another possible scenario is that you could write a handler that resets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A> property for the element that is the event source, just before the tooltip is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 另一种情形是，你可以编写的处理程序的值重置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>是事件源中，工具提示显示之前的元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening> will not be raised if the value of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A> is `null` or otherwise unset.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening> 如果不会引发的值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>是`null`或其他取消设置。

trans-unit.source: Do not deliberately set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A> to `null` while a tooltip is open or opening; this will not have the effect of closing the tooltip, and will instead create an undesirable visual artifact in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 不要特意将<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A>到`null`工具提示已打开，或者打开; 这不会关闭工具提示的效果，并改为将在 UI 中创建不需要的可视化项目时。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening> event cannot be an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening>事件不能为<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>样式。

trans-unit.source: This is because the identifier field of this event re-uses an implementation from a service that does not expose add/remove event methods for the service-level event.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为此事件的标识符字段重新使用从服务不会公开为服务级别事件的添加/删除事件方法的实现。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Direct
trans-unit.target: 直接

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: 委托

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnToolTipClosing%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnToolTipClosing%2A>实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of triggers established directly on this element, or in child elements.
trans-unit.target: 获取直接在此元素上或在子元素中建立的触发器的集合。

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Trigger" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个强类型的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Trigger" /> 对象集合。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] through the collection syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as Add.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅在中设置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通过集合语法所示，或通过访问的集合对象并使用它的各种方法，例如 Add。

trans-unit.source: The property to access the collection object itself is read-only, the collection itself is read-write.
trans-unit.target: 要访问集合对象本身的属性是只读的该集合本身是读写。

trans-unit.source: The property only exists on root elements; attempting to find it or set it elsewhere will cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 仅存在于根元素; 上的属性尝试查找它或将其设置在其他位置将会导致引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This property does not enable you to examine triggers that exist as part of styles in use on this element.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不允许你检查作为中此元素上使用的样式的一部分存在的触发器。

trans-unit.source: It only reports the collection of triggers that are literally added to the collection, either in markup or code.
trans-unit.target: 它只报告的按其原义添加到集合，在标记或代码中的触发器的集合。

trans-unit.source: Elements do not typically have such elements existing by default (through a template for instance); it is more common for triggers that come from control compositing to be established in styles instead.
trans-unit.target: 元素通常没有现有默认情况下此类元素 (通过模板的实例);很多常见的来自控件组合建立样式中的触发器。

trans-unit.source: In terms of behavior (and trying to establish which effect came from which element's declared <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Triggers%2A> collection), both the triggering condition and the trigger effect might be on this element, or might be on its child elements in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 在行为方面 (以及尝试确定哪个效果来自哪个元素的声明<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Triggers%2A>集合)，触发条件以及触发器产生什么影响可能会针对此元素，或者可能对其逻辑树中的子元素。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you use lifetime events such as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> to get this collection, the child element's triggers might not yet be fully loaded, and the collection will be smaller than it would truly be at run time.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果您使用生存期事件如<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>若要获取此集合，子元素的触发器可能尚未进行完全加载，而且则集合将为小于在运行时将真正。

trans-unit.source: Note that the collection of triggers established on an element only supports <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>, not property triggers (<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在元素上建立的触发器集合仅支持<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>，不属性触发器 (<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>)。

trans-unit.source: If you require property triggers, you must place these within a style or template and then assign that style or template to the element either directly through the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property, or indirectly through an implicit style reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要属性触发器，你必须将这些样式或模板中并将该样式或模板的元素或者直接通过<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性，或间接通过隐式样式引用。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreTriggers*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreTriggers*

trans-unit.source: One or more defined <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> elements.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个已定义<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>元素。

trans-unit.source: Each such trigger is expected to contain valid storyboard actions and references.
trans-unit.target: 每个此类触发器应包含有效的情节提要操作和引用。

trans-unit.source: Note that this collection can only be established on the root element of a page.
trans-unit.target: 请注意此集合仅可以建立一个页的根元素上。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier of the resource to be found.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的资源的键标识符。

trans-unit.source: Searches for a resource with the specified key, and returns that resource if found.
trans-unit.target: 搜索具有指定键的资源，如果找到，则返回该资源。

trans-unit.source: The found resource, or <see langword="null" /> if no resource with the provided <paramref name="key" /> is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到的资源；如果未找到具有所提供 <paramref name="key" /> 的资源，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the resource is not found on the calling element, the parent resource tree is searched upward through the logical tree, in the same way that the tree would be searched if a resource were requested by key at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用元素上未找到资源，在逻辑树向上搜索父资源树，在树的方法相同的资源请求时搜索由参数在运行时。

trans-unit.source: The method returns `null` only if no resource of that key existed anywhere in the resource tree, per the existing conditions of the tree at the time that <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TryFindResource%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回`null`仅当在资源树中，每次树的现有条件的任何位置都不存在该密钥的任何资源，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TryFindResource%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Typically you would immediately cast the return value to the type of the property that you were attempting to set with the returned resource value.
trans-unit.target: 通常将立即强制转换为已尝试用返回的资源值进行设置的属性的类型的返回值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindResource%2A> method has similar behavior, except that it throws an exception if no resource with the provided key was returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindResource%2A>方法具有类似的行为，只是返回具有提供的键的资源时，它会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following example is implemented as a button handler, where the button being clicked sets its background to a resource-defined brush obtained by calling <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TryFindResource%2A> on itself.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实现一个按钮处理程序，其中的按钮被单击时会将其背景为资源定义画笔获取设置通过调用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TryFindResource%2A>本身上。

trans-unit.source: This walks the element tree and finds the resource (the resource itself is defined in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and is not shown).
trans-unit.target: 这将遍历元素树并查找资源 (资源本身中定义[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]并且不会显示)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the element is removed from within an element tree of loaded elements.
trans-unit.target: 当从加载的元素的元素树中移除元素时发生。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do not follow a route, they are only handled within the same element on which they are raised.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件不遵循路由，而仅处理引发它们时对同一元素中。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do support other routed event behavior: they support an accessible handlers collection, and can be used as an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件是否支持其他路由的事件行为： 它们支持的可访问的处理程序集合，并可用作<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>样式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded> might both be raised on controls as a result of user-initiated system theme changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> 和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded>可能同时会引发在用户启动的系统主题更改控件上。

trans-unit.source: A theme change causes an invalidation of the control template and the contained visual tree, which in turn causes the entire control to unload and reload.
trans-unit.target: 主题更改会导致控件模板和包含的可视化树，这反过来会导致整个控件，若要卸载并重新加载的失效。

trans-unit.source: Therefore <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded> cannot be assumed to occur only on navigation away from the page.
trans-unit.target: 因此<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded>不能假定只会在导航离开页面。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded> event is not raised after an application begins shutting down.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded>在应用程序开始关闭后，则不会引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Application shutdown occurs when the condition defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> property occurs.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序时，发生所定义的条件<xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>属性出现。

trans-unit.source: If you place cleanup code within a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded> event, such as for a <xref:System.Windows.Window> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UserControl>, it may not be called as expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将清理代码的处理程序中放置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded>事件，例如对于<xref:System.Windows.Window>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.UserControl>，它可能不会调用按预期方式。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Direct
trans-unit.target: 直接

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: 委托

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Name of the name-object pair to remove from the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 要从当前范围中移除的名称-对象对的名称。

trans-unit.source: Simplifies access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.NameScope" /> de-registration method.
trans-unit.target: 简化对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.NameScope" /> 注销方法的访问。

trans-unit.source: You only need to un-register names if you intend to re-register another element with that same name.
trans-unit.target: 您只需要取消注册名称到如果你想要重新注册该同名的另一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Reapplies the default style to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 将默认样式重新应用至当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether layout rounding should be applied to this element's size and position during layout.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应向此元素的大小和位置布局应用布局舍入。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if layout rounding is applied; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用布局舍入，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.UseLayoutRounding%2A> property for an element is `true`, all non-integral pixel values that are calculated during the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> passes are rounded to whole pixel values.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.UseLayoutRounding%2A>的元素的属性是`true`，过程中所计算的所有非整型像素值<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>传递舍入为整数像素值。

trans-unit.source: This property is inherited by child elements.
trans-unit.target: 此属性被继承的子元素。

trans-unit.source: You should set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.UseLayoutRounding%2A> to `true` on the root element.
trans-unit.target: 应设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.UseLayoutRounding%2A>到`true`根元素上。

trans-unit.source: The layout system adds child coordinates to the parent coordinates; therefore, if the parent coordinates are not on a pixel boundary, the child coordinates are also not on a pixel boundary.
trans-unit.target: 布局系统将子坐标添加到父坐标中;因此，如果父坐标不像素边界上，子坐标也是像素边界上。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.UseLayoutRounding%2A> cannot be set at the root, set <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.SnapsToDevicePixels%2A> on the child to obtain the effect that you want.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.UseLayoutRounding%2A>不能在根目录设置、 设置<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.SnapsToDevicePixels%2A>在的子活动以获取所需的效果。

trans-unit.source: Drawing objects on pixel boundaries eliminates the semi-transparent edges that are produced by anti-aliasing, when an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel.
trans-unit.target: 对象绘制像素边界上消除了一条边不再处于中间设备像素时，生成的抗锯齿的半透明边缘。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the output of a single pixel-width line that falls in the middle of a device pixel.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示的单个像素宽度行的位置在设备像素的中间输出。

trans-unit.source: The line on the left does not use layout rounding and is anti-aliased.
trans-unit.target: 在左侧的行不使用布局舍入，并且是消除锯齿。

trans-unit.source: The line on the right uses layout rounding.
trans-unit.target: 在右侧的行使用布局舍入。

trans-unit.source: ![Anti-aliased line compared to single pixel line.](~/add/media/pixelsnaplinecompare.PNG "Anti-aliased line compared to single pixel line.")
trans-unit.target: ![反-带锯齿的线与单像素线的比较。](~/add/media/pixelsnaplinecompare.PNG "消除锯齿的线与单像素线的比较。")

trans-unit.source: When you use layout rounding and <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Star> sizing, the layout system creates small variations in the column or row measurements to avoid subpixel rendering.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用布局舍入和<xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Star>调整大小，该布局系统中的列或行的度量值以避免子像素呈现中创建小型变体。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a grid has a total width of 100 with 3 columns each of size <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Star>, instead of creating three columns that have an equal width of 33.3, the layout system creates 2 columns that have a width of 33 and one that has a width of 34.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果一个网格，具有 100 具有 3 列每个大小的总宽度<xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Star>，而不是创建三个列都具有 33.3 的相等宽度，该布局系统创建具有 33 到其中一个的宽度为 34 的宽度的 2 列。

trans-unit.source: In .NET 4.6 changes were made to layout rounding to reduce instances of clipping in controls with borders.
trans-unit.target: .NET 4.6 中对布局舍入以减少带边框的控件中的剪切实例进行了更改。

trans-unit.source: By default, this feature is enabled if your Target Framework is .NET Framework 4.6 or higher.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果目标框架是.NET Framework 4.6 或更高版本启用此功能。

trans-unit.source: Applications that target earlier versions of the framework can opt in into the new behavior by adding the following setting to an app.config file: `<runtime><AppContextSwitchOverrides value="Switch.MS.Internal.DoNotApplyLayoutRoundingToMarginsAndBorderThickness=false"/></runtime>` The setting only takes effect when the application is running on the .NET Framework 4.6.
trans-unit.target: 面向的 framework 的早期版本的应用程序可以选择加入到新的行为通过将以下设置添加到 app.config 文件：`<runtime><AppContextSwitchOverrides value="Switch.MS.Internal.DoNotApplyLayoutRoundingToMarginsAndBorderThickness=false"/></runtime>`时在.NET Framework 4.6 上运行该应用程序后，该设置将仅将生效。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the effect that the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.UseLayoutRounding%2A> property has on a single pixel-width line.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的效果，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.UseLayoutRounding%2A>属性具有单个像素宽度行上。

trans-unit.source: The line on the left does not use layout rounding and the line on the right uses layout rounding.
trans-unit.target: 在左侧的行不使用布局舍入，并在右侧的行使用布局舍入。

trans-unit.source: If you slowly resize the window, you can see the difference that layout rounding makes.
trans-unit.target: 如果渐变调整窗口的大小，你可以看到该布局舍入的区别。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.UseLayoutRounding" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.UseLayoutRounding" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical alignment characteristics applied to this element when it is composed within a parent element such as a panel or items control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在父元素（如面板或项控件）中组合此元素时所应用的垂直对齐特征。

trans-unit.source: A vertical alignment setting.
trans-unit.target: 垂直对齐设置。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> properties are explicitly set on an element, these measurements take layout precedent and cancel the regular effects of setting this property to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>元素上显式设置属性，这些度量值需要布局引用单元格，并且取消此属性设置为的正则效果<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> is the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] property accessor for what is in reality a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]它实际上是依赖项属性的属性访问器。

trans-unit.source: This particular dependency property quite frequently has its apparent "default" value set differently in derived element classes, particularly controls.
trans-unit.target: 此特定的依赖项属性非常普遍地具有派生的元素类，尤其是控件中以不同方式设置其原本"默认"值。

trans-unit.source: This generally occurs in one of two ways: the dependency property is re-registered to a particular derived class, but with different metadata for setting its defaults; or there is a default style being applied that sets that dependency property value differently.
trans-unit.target: 这通常发生在两种方式之一： 为特定的派生类中，但具有不同的元数据，用于设置其默认值; 重新注册依赖项属性或者应用了默认样式以不同方式设置的依赖项属性值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the apparent "default" of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> control will be <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>, even though <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> inherits <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> direct from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，明显"默认"的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>控件将是<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>，即使<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>继承<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>直接从<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>。

trans-unit.source: This is because that value was reset within the default style of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>, within the style's control template.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为该值已重置中的默认样式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>中的样式的控件模板。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> does not use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> when composing layout, because <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> is based on absolute positioning.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> 不使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>构成布局，因为时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>根据绝对定位。

trans-unit.source: When inherited by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> or any derived classes, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> redefines the default value of this property to be <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>.
trans-unit.target: 当通过继承<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>或任何派生类中，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>重新定义为此属性的默认值<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of visual child elements within this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此元素内可视子元素的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of visual child elements for this element.
trans-unit.target: 此元素内可视子元素的数目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> implementation of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VisualChildrenCount%2A> always returns either zero or one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>实现<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VisualChildrenCount%2A>始终返回零个或一个。

trans-unit.source: Classes that maintain a visual child collection that might exceed one must override both this property and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 维护可能超过 1 的可视子集合的类必须重写此属性和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This property is generally used to determine the upper bounds of the current child collection for purposes of implementing the layout overrides (<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常用于确定当前的子集合，以便实现布局重写的上限 (<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how a custom adorner uses the values declared by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection> that it maintains for its multiple visual children and reports these values through overrides of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VisualChildrenCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何自定义的装饰器使用声明的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection>它还为多个 visual 子级保留，并报告这些值通过替代的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VisualChildrenCount%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetVisualChild%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If your class supports more than one visual child in a child element collection, override this property to return the count of elements in that collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的类支持多个可视子子元素集合中，重写此属性以返回该集合中的元素计数。

trans-unit.source: You must do this even if the collection object itself returns a count.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合对象本身返回计数时，必须执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: Element layout logic at the WPF framework level presumes that all elements will return a valid count through their <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VisualChildrenCount" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 在 WPF 框架级别的元素的布局逻辑假定所有元素将都返回一个有效的计数，通过其<see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VisualChildrenCount" />属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width of the element, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 元素的宽度，单位是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: This value must be equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 此值必须等于或大于 0.0。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks for upper bound information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅“备注”以了解上限信息。

trans-unit.source: This is one of three properties on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that specify width information.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个三个属性上<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>指定宽度的信息。

trans-unit.source: The other two are <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 另外两个是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If there is a conflict between these values, the order of application for actual width determination is first <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A> must be honored, then <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>, and finally if each of these are within bounds, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些值之间没有冲突，应用程序实际宽度确定的顺序是： 首先<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A>必须采用，然后<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>，最后每个都在限制之内，如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The return value of this property is always the same as any value that was set to it.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的返回值始终是任何已设置为它的值相同。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> may vary.
trans-unit.target: 相反，值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>可能会有所不同。

trans-unit.source: The layout may have rejected the suggested size for some reason.
trans-unit.target: 布局可能已被拒绝的建议的大小出于某种原因。

trans-unit.source: Also, the layout system itself works asynchronously relative to the property system set of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> and may not have processed that particular sizing property change yet.
trans-unit.target: 此外，该布局系统本身以异步方式工作相对于属性的属性系统集<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>，可能不处理该特定的大小调整属性的更改。

trans-unit.source: In addition to acceptable <xref:System.Double> values, this property can also be <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此外可接受<xref:System.Double>值，此属性也可以是<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This is how you specify auto sizing behavior.
trans-unit.target: 这是如何指定自动调整大小行为。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] you set the value to the string "Auto" (case insensitive) to enable the auto sizing behavior.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]你设置的值为字符串"自动"（不区分大小写） 若要启用自动调整大小行为。

trans-unit.source: Auto sizing behavior implies that the element will fill the width available to it.
trans-unit.target: 自动调整大小行为意味着元素将填满可用的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Note however that specific controls frequently supply default values in their default styles that will disable the auto sizing behavior unless it is specifically re-enabled.
trans-unit.target: 但是请注意，特定的控件通常提供将禁用自动调整大小行为，除非专门重新启用了其默认样式中的默认值。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the validation check, there is a nondeterministic upper value bound for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> that is enforced by the layout system (this is a very large number, larger than <xref:System.Single.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> but smaller than <xref:System.Double.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: 除了验证检查，没有为具有不确定性上限值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>，由布局系统强制执行 (这是非常大的数，大于<xref:System.Single.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>但小于<xref:System.Double.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: If you exceed this bound, the element will not render, and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果超过此限制，该元素将不会呈现，并不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Do not set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> to a value that is significantly larger than the maximum size of any possible visual display, or you may exceed this nondeterministic upper bound.
trans-unit.target: 未设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>为远远大于任何可能的可视显示，或你的最大大小可能超出此非确定性上限值。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *double*
trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式<xref:System.Double>等于或大于 0.0 的值。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks for upper bound information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅“备注”以了解上限信息。

trans-unit.source: This value is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 此值解释为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字符串不需要显式包括位小数。

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值的`1`是可以接受的。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble*
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble*

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*该值，上文所述跟以下单位声明字符串之一： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （默认值） 是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in==96px
trans-unit.target: `in` 为英寸;1 英寸 = = 96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px
`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
Enables autosizing behavior.
trans-unit.target: 启用自动调整大小行为。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅“备注”。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width" /> 依赖项属性。
